Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.model.cards.playable

Class ResourceCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.model.cards.playable.PlayableCard
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.model.cards.playable.ResourceCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardIdentity, FieldCard
public final class ResourceCard extends PlayableCard
This class represents a resource card.

Each attribute is immutable.

The class can only be instantiated through the static inner builder ResourceCard.Builder.

    • getPlacingRequirements

      @NotNull public @NotNull Map<GameColor,Integer> getPlacingRequirements()
      Description copied from class: PlayableCard
      Gets the number of colors in the field needed to place the card.

      For ResourceCard all color requirements will be 0 as they have no requirements to place.

      Specified by:
      getPlacingRequirements in class PlayableCard
      Returns:
      a Map of keys colors and as values their requirements to place on the field in int

      @NotNull @Contract(pure=true) public @NotNull CornerContainer getItemCorner (@NotNull @NotNull Corner corner)
      Description copied from class: PlayableCard
      Checks if there is an item in a specified corner of the PlayableCard.

      The method returns a CornerContainer object representing the item or its Availability.

      The method is marked as pure, meaning it doesnâ€™t modify the state of the object and only returns a value.

    • getSymbolToCollect

      @NotNull public @NotNull Optional<Symbol> getSymbolToCollect()
      Description copied from class: PlayableCard
      Getter method for the symbol to collect if there is any

      A Symbol is present when the card PointsRequirementsType is SYMBOLS, otherwise it will return an empty Optional.

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable (@NotNull @NotNull Corner corner, boolean isRetro)
      Description copied from interface: FieldCard
      This method is part of the FieldCard interface.

      It checks whether a specific corner of the card is available or not.

      Retro mode can alter the availability of corners based on specific game rules.

      Parameters:
      corner - Corner - The corner to check for availability.
      isRetro - boolean - Whether to check in retro mode or not.
      Returns:
      boolean - True if the corner is available, false otherwise.

    • getItemCorner

      @NotNull public @NotNull CornerContainer getItemCorner (@NotNull @NotNull Corner corner, boolean isRetro)
      Description copied from interface: FieldCard
      This method is part of the FieldCard interface.

      It is used to get the CornerContainer object associated with a specific corner of the card.

      The CornerContainer object can contain a value of Color, Symbol, or Availability.

      Retro mode can alter the contents of the corner based on specific game rules.

      The method can return null if the corner does not contain an item or is not available.

      Parameters:
      corner - Corner - The corner to check for an item.
      isRetro - boolean - Whether to check in retro mode or not.
      Returns:
      CornerContainer - The CornerContainer object associated with the corner or null if the corner is not available or does not contain an item.
